accent_color_description: Select an accent color to customize the appearance of Arcane
custom_accent_color_description: Enter a custom color using valid CSS color formats (e.g., hex, rgb, hsl).
common_not_found_description: Die angeforderte {resource} konnte nicht gefunden werden oder ist nicht mehr verfügbar.
common_delete_confirm: Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie {resource} löschen möchten? Diese Aktion kann nicht rückgängig gemacht werden.

common_confirm_removal_message: Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie diesen {type} entfernen möchten? Diese Aktion kann nicht rückgängig gemacht werden.
common_confirm_destroy_message: Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie diese {type}löschen möchten? Diese Aktion ist DESTRUCTIVE und entfernt zugehörige Ressourcen und kann nicht rückgängig gemacht werden.
common_confirm_redeploy_message: Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie dieses Projekt neu verteilen möchten? Dies wird die neuesten Bilder ziehen und bei Bedarf Container neu erstellen.
confirm_remove_volumes_warning: Remove volumes (Warning: Data will be lost)
common_empty_state_description: Erstellen Sie einen neuen {resource} mit dem obigen Button.
common_labels_description: Metadata labels attached to this container for organization and automation
auth_login_subtitle: Sign in to manage your containers
auth_no_login_methods_description: There are currently no login methods enabled. Please contact an administrator.
auth_enter_credentials_required: Please enter both username and password
auth_tagline: Modern Docker Management, Designed for Everyone.
auth_processing_login_description: Please wait while we complete your authentication.
auth_oidc_invalid_response: There was an issue with the OIDC login response. Please try again.
auth_oidc_misconfigured: OIDC is not configured correctly on the server. Please contact an administrator.
auth_oidc_userinfo_failed: Could not retrieve your user information from the OIDC provider.
auth_oidc_missing_sub: Your OIDC provider did not return a subject identifier.
auth_oidc_email_collision: An account with your email already exists but is linked to a different OIDC identity. Please contact an administrator.
auth_oidc_token_error: There was an error obtaining tokens from the OIDC provider.
auth_user_processing_failed: An error occurred while processing your user account.
auth_unexpected_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
auth_oidc_access_denied: Access was denied. You may have cancelled the login or lack permission.
auth_oidc_invalid_request: Invalid authentication request. Please try again.
auth_oidc_state_mismatch: Security validation failed. Please try logging in again.
auth_oidc_session_expired: Authentication session expired. Please try again.
auth_oidc_user_info_missing: Authentication succeeded but user information is missing.
auth_oidc_callback_error: An error occurred during authentication. Please try again.
auth_oidc_network_error: Network error during authentication. Please check your connection and try again.
auth_oidc_url_generation_failed: Unable to generate authentication URL. Please try again or contact your administrator.
auth_oidc_init_failed: Failed to initiate OIDC login. Please try again.
auth_oidc_redirecting_description: Please wait while we redirect you to your identity provider.

general_description: Core configuration settings for the application
general_projects_description: Configure where Arcane looks for your Compose files.
general_projects_directory_help: Directory where Docker Compose files are stored (this is inside the container)
general_base_url_help: The Base URL for your docker host. Used when opening containers from the service links
general_user_avatars_description: Control Gravatar usage for profile images.
general_enable_gravatar_description: Whether to use Gravatar-based avatars for user accounts
security_description: Configure authentication methods, session timeouts, and other security-related options.
security_local_auth_description: Username and password stored by Arcane. Keep enabled as a fallback.
security_oidc_auth_description_forced: Use an external OIDC provider (forced by server)
security_server_forces_oidc_missing_env: Server forces OIDC, but env vars missing. Configure or fix server env.
security_oidc_configured_forced_view: OIDC configured & forced by server. View status.
security_session_timeout_description: Inactive sessions will be logged out automatically (15–1440 minutes).
security_password_policy_standard_toolti: 10+ chars with upper, lower, and a number.
security_password_policy_strong_tooltip: 12+ chars with upper, lower, number, and symbol.
security_enable_one_provider: Enable at least one authentication provider.
security_enable_one_provider_error: At least one authentication provider must be enabled.
security_local_enabled_info: Local Authentication enabled to ensure at least one provider is active.
docker_description: Configure Docker automation behavior and settings.
docker_terminal_settings_description: Configure default shell for container terminals
docker_default_shell_description: The default shell to use when opening a terminal in a container
docker_shell_custom_path_help: Enter the full path to the shell executable
docker_cleanup_settings_description: Configure how Docker images are pruned
docker_prune_all_description: Remove all images not referenced by containers and include named, unused volumes during System Prune.
docker_prune_dangling_description: Remove only dangling (untagged) images and anonymous volumes during System Prune.
docker_prune_mode_description: Choose how unused images and volumes should be pruned.
docker_auto_updates_description: Automatically update containers when new images are available
docker_enable_polling_description: Periodically check registries for newer image versions
docker_polling_interval_description: How often to check for new images (5-10080 minutes)
docker_auto_update_description: Automatically update containers when newer images are found
docker_auto_update_interval_description: How often to perform automatic updates (5-1440 minutes)
docker_auto_update_alert_description: Automatic container updates are active with polling enabled
docker_rate_limit_warning_description: Polling intervals below 30 minutes may trigger registry rate limits. Prefer longer intervals in production.
navigation_mobile_behavior_description: Configure global defaults and personal overrides for mobile behavior
navigation_mobile_appearance_description: Configure the visual style and presentation of mobile interface
navigation_mode_description: Choose between floating navigation that overlays content or docked navigation that takes up screen space
navigation_show_labels_description: Display text labels below navigation icons for better clarity and accessibility
navigation_desktop_sidebar_description: Verhalten und Aussehen der Desktop-Sidebar konfigurieren
navigation_sidebar_hover_expansion_descr: Wenn aktiviert, wird das Schweben über der eingeklappten Seitenleiste vorübergehend erweitert, um die vollständigen Bezeichnungen anzuzeigen. Wenn deaktiviert, werden stattdessen Tooltips für eine sauberere Navigation mit fester Breite angezeigt.
disk_usage_settings_description: Configure which directory to monitor for disk usage metrics.
disk_usage_save_failed: Failed to update disk usage path
customize_subtitle: Customize templates, registries, and configuration defaults
customize_try_adjusting: Try adjusting your search terms or browse categories above.
customize_category_defaults_description: Configure default settings and templates for new projects
customize_category_templates_description: Create and manage custom project templates and projects
customize_category_variables_description: Manage environment variables and configuration templates
templates_subtitle: Manage Docker Compose template sources and registries
templates_registries_section_description: Mit Remote-Quellen für Community-und benutzerdefinierte Vorlagen verbinden
templates_alert_remote_registries_descri: Add remote template registries to access community templates. Registries should provide a JSON manifest with template definitions and download URLs.
templates_community_registry_description: Get started quickly with our community registry containing popular templates:
templates_no_registries_description: Add a remote template registry to access community templates
templates_add_registry_description: Add a remote template registry to access community templates.
templates_registry_url_description: URL to the registry JSON manifest
templates_enable_registry_description: Enable this registry to fetch templates
templates_registry_invalid_format: Invalid registry format: missing required fields (name, templates)
templates_choose_description: Browse templates from your registries or local downloads. Scroll to see more, select to use immediately, or download for offline use.
templates_group_by_registry_description: Enable Collapsible Sections for each registry
templates_defaults_description: Passen Sie die Standard-Docker Compose und Umgebungsvorlagen an, die beim Erstellen neuer Projekte verwendet werden. Diese Vorlagen werden im neuen Projektformular vorbelegt.
templates_validation_error: Bitte beheben Sie Validierungsfehler vor dem Speichern
registries_subtitle: Configure access credentials for private Docker registries and container repositories
registries_remove_selected_message: Are you sure you want to remove the selected registry(ies)? This action cannot be undone.
registries_credentials_description: Manage authentication credentials for private Docker registries like Docker Hub, GitHub Container Registry, Google Container Registry, and custom registries
registries_info_description: Common registry URLs and authentication requirements
registries_auth_notes_bullet_docker_hub: Docker Hub requires credentials for private repositories
registries_auth_notes_bullet_github: GitHub uses personal access tokens as passwords
registries_auth_notes_bullet_anonymous: Some registries support anonymous access for public images
registries_auth_notes_bullet_encrypted: Credentials are encrypted and stored securely
registries_add_description: Enter the details for the new container registry.
registries_edit_description: Update the details for this container registry.
registries_url_description: Leave empty or use 'docker.io' for Docker Hub
registries_token_keep_placeholder: Leave empty to keep current token
registries_token_description: Use a Personal Access Token or your password if the registry supports it.
variables_subtitle: Manage global environment variables that are available to all projects
variables_about_description: These variables are stored in .env.global at the root of your projects directory and are available to all Docker Compose projects.
variables_no_variables_description: Click "Add" to create your first variable
variables_duplicate_keys_error: Duplicate keys found. Please ensure all keys are unique.
variables_save_failed: Failed to save. Please try again.
log_stream_closed_by_server: {type} log stream was closed by server
log_stream_failed_connect: Failed to connect to {type} log stream
log_stream_no_project_selected: No project selected. Please select a project to view logs.
log_stream_no_container_selected: No container selected. Please select a container to view logs.
log_viewer_no_logs_available: No logs available. Start streaming to see logs.
docker_info_dialog_description: Detailed information about your Docker installation
progress_in_progress_note: This may take a while depending on size and connection.
image_update_querying_registry: Registry für die neueste Version… wird abgefragt
image_update_click_to_check: Click to check for updates from registry.
image_update_unable_check_tags: Unable to check updates for images without proper tags.
oidc_viewmode_description: OIDC authentication is configured and forced ON by server-side environment variables. These settings are read-only.
oidc_configure_description: Configure the OIDC settings for your application. These settings will be saved to the database and used for OIDC authentication.
oidc_server_env_config_description: The following OIDC settings are loaded from the server environment:
oidc_client_secret_placeholder: Provided by your OIDC Provider (leave blank to keep existing)
oidc_issuer_url_description: The issuer URL will be used to auto-discover OIDC endpoints.
oidc_admin_role_mapping_description: Map an OIDC claim to grant the admin role. Examples: roles=admin, groups=admin, or admin=true.
oidc_env_config_missing: OIDC configuration details not found in effective settings.
oidc_env_changes_note: Changes to these settings must be made in your server's environment configuration.
oidc_redirect_uri_description: Configure this redirect URI in your OIDC provider:
oidc_tip_1: If your server forces OIDC, app settings become read-only.
oidc_tip_2: Use issuer discovery; avoid hardcoding endpoints.
oidc_tip_3: Keep client secrets out of the UI when possible.
prune_confirm_description: Select the resources you want to prune. This action permanently removes unused data and cannot be undone.
prune_volumes_guidance: Only enable this if you are certain no important data resides in unused volumes.
prune_volumes_warning_description: Pruning volumes permanently deletes data. Ensure you have backups if necessary.
create_network_description: Configure and create a new Docker network.
network_labels_description: Enter additional labels as key=value pairs, one per line
network_gateway_description: Gateway IP address for the network
network_driver_options_description: Geben Sie Treiber-spezifische Optionen als Schlüssel=Wert-Paare ein (z.B. parent=eth0 für macvlan), eine pro Zeile
create_volume_description: Enter the details for the new Docker volume.
volume_driver_description: Choose the storage driver for your volume
volume_driver_options_description: Enter driver-specific options as key=value pairs, one per line
polling_hourly_description: Check for new images every 60 minutes
polling_daily_description: Check for new images every 1440 minutes
polling_weekly_description: Check for new images every 10080 minutes
use_custom_polling_value: Use a custom polling value between 5-10080 minutes
ui_config_disabled_description: Settings must be managed via environment variables.
registries_remove_message: Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie die Registry {url} entfernen möchten?
users_delete_selected_message: Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie {count} ausgewählte Benutzer(n) löschen möchten?
users_delete_user_message: Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie den Benutzer "{username} "löschen möchten?
events_delete_selected_message: Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie {count} ausgewählte Ereignisse(n) löschen möchten?
events_delete_confirm_message: Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie das Ereignis "{title} "löschen wollen?
notifications_read_only_description: Einstellungen sind in dieser Umgebung schreibgeschützt. Konfigurationsänderungen sind deaktiviert.
notifications_discord_description: Sende Benachrichtigungen an Discord, wenn Containerupdates erkannt werden
notifications_discord_enabled_descriptio: Sende Update-Benachrichtigungen an Discord über Webhook
notifications_discord_webhook_url_help: Discord Webhook URL für das Senden von Benachrichtigungen
notifications_email_description: Benachrichtigungen per E-Mail senden, wenn Containerupdates erkannt werden
notifications_email_from_address_help: E-Mail-Adresse zum Senden von Benachrichtigungen von
notifications_email_to_addresses_help: Kommaseparierte Liste von E-Mail-Adressen zum Senden von Benachrichtigungen an
notifications_events_description: Wählen Sie, welche Ereignisse Benachrichtigungen auslösen
notifications_event_image_update_descrip: Benachrichtigen, wenn eine neue Bildversion verfügbar ist
notifications_event_container_update_des: Benachrichtigen, wenn ein Container aktualisiert oder neu gestartet wird
glass_effect_description: Modernes Glasmorphismus-Design mit Unschärfen, Farbverläufen und Umgebungseffekten aktivieren
glass_effect_description_long: Wenn aktiviert, verwendet die Schnittstelle gefrorene Glas-Effekte mit Hintergrundunschärfe und subtilen Farbverläufen. Wenn das Interface deaktiviert ist, verwendet die Oberfläche feste Farben und traditionelle Schatten für ein klassisches Design. Das Glasdesign ist in der Vorschau und kann geändert werden.
first_login_description: Aus Sicherheitsgründen müssen Sie das Standardpasswort ändern, bevor Sie fortfahren.
first_login_error_length: Passwort muss mindestens 8 Zeichen lang sein
upgrade_confirm_description: Sie sind dabei Arcane auf Version {version} zu aktualisieren.
upgrade_step_pull: Das neueste Arkane Docker Bild ziehen
upgrade_step_start: Einen neuen Container mit dem aktualisierten Bild starten
upgrade_warning_interruption: Dies wird eine kurze Unterbrechung des Dienstes verursachen (~30 Sekunden)
upgrade_success: Upgrade erfolgreich gestartet. Arcane wird in Kürze neu starten.
upgrade_wait_message: Das Upgrade ist im Gange. Dies kann je nach Verbindungsgeschwindigkeit einige Minuten dauern.
upgrade_reload_message: Bitte aktualisieren Sie diese Seite manuell, sobald das Upgrade abgeschlossen ist (normalerweise 1-2 Minuten).
upgrade_reload_auto: Seite wird automatisch in {countdown} Sekunden neu geladen
upgrade_remote_description: Sie sind dabei {targetDescription} auf v{version} zu aktualisieren.
upgrade_phase_stopping: Stoppe alte Container und starte einen neuen...
upgrade_phase_restarting: Neuer Container ist bereit, wird neu geladen...
upgrade_status_pulling: Lade neue Version herunter und bereite den Neustart vor...
upgrade_wait_info: Dies kann 30-60 Sekunden dauern. Die Seite wird automatisch neu geladen, wenn sie bereit ist.
